INTERNSHIP SPECIFICATIONS

Feature Details
Duration 4 weeks (Dec 22 onwards)
Mode Online Only
Hours 9 AM - 6 PM (Mon-Sat)
Device Desktop/Laptop (Required)
Camera Mandatory (Always ON)
Leave 1 day maximum

QUICK START GUIDE

‚ö° First Day Setup (5 Steps)

  1. Join Zoom ‚Üí Use NPTEL registration name & email
  2. Access ViBe ‚Üí Click invite link ‚Üí Continue with Google
  3. Join Cliq ‚Üí Desktop only ‚Üí Enable Universal Access
  4. Upload Photo ‚Üí Cliq profile (face visible)
  5. Fill Form ‚Üí Daily attendance (NPTEL offer letter)

üìÖ Daily Routine

Time Action
9 AM - 6 PM Zoom session (Camera ON)
Throughout day ViBe progress + Case Studies
Evening Fill attendance form
Anytime Help peers on Cliq

Sunday: Rest day (no form required)

‚ö†Ô∏è Failure = Termination

Video Stuck?

  1. Refresh page
  2. Try different browser
  3. Clear cache
  4. Email: internship-support@vicharanashala.zohodesk.in

üí¨ Zoho Cliq Channel

Join (Desktop Only):

  1. Email invite ‚Üí Open
  2. Login with Google (same email)
  3. #Channels ‚Üí Join
  4. Find #NPTEL Winter Internship ‚Üí Join

Can‚Äôt Join?

  • Profile ‚Üí Admin Panel ‚Üí Policies ‚Üí Channel Collaboration
  • Enable both Universal Access checkboxes ‚Üí Refresh

Profile Picture:

  • accounts.zoho.com ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Preferences
  • Set visibility to ‚ÄúAnyone‚Äù ‚Üí Upload photo

Cliq Rules:

  • ‚úÖ Ask in channel (not DM)
  • ‚úÖ Reply in threads
  • ‚úÖ Check before posting
  • ‚ùå No duplicate queries

Reactions:

  • üëç Query received
  • ‚úÖ Resolved
  • üîî FYI
  • ‚ûï Same issue

üîß GitHub Classroom

Submit Assignment:

  1. Accept assignment (repo auto-created)
  2. Read README.md
  3. Edit allowed files only
  4. Commit & push

Auto-Grading:

  • ‚úÖ Green tick = Pass
  • ‚ùå Red cross = Fail
  • Check: GitHub Actions tab
  • Fix & commit again

Won‚Äôt Open?

  • Edit directly on GitHub, OR
  • Wait for VS Code loading, OR
  • Clone to local folder

üìπ Video Guide: youtu.be/lrpjRo9Z02Y

üìö Case Studies

How to Submit:

  1. Click Case Studies ‚Üí Pick lesson
  2. Read documentation
  3. Code in VS Code (single file)
  4. Submit: Submission Form
  5. Multiple files? Compress to ZIP

Technologies:

  • TypeScript
  • React
  • Express.js
  • MongoDB

Deadline: Jan 4, 2026 (Wednesday)

Track Progress: Dashboard

Stuck? ‚Üí Join Zoom breakout rooms ‚Üí Collaborate

HEALTH POINTS SYSTEM

Earn Points:

  • Help peers on Cliq
  • ViBe progress
  • Max: Once/day

Lose Points:

  • Camera OFF in Zoom
  • Wrong channel/thread
  • Non-compliance

Class Points: Awarded when minimum attendance met

PEER ENDORSEMENT (Viva/PES)

Requirements:

  • Need: 5 evaluators (other interns)
  • Rule: No mutual evaluation (A‚ÜíB means B cannot‚ÜíA)
  • Preference: Different institutes
  • Timing: After completing all Case Studies

How It Works:

  1. Choose 5 evaluators
  2. They fill Google Form (dashboard)
  3. Endorsement = Learning validation
  4. No rating/scoring

Silver Ticket:

  • Evaluate 25+ people ‚Üí Teaching team evaluates you
  • No peer evaluation needed

‚ö†Ô∏è Choose carefully: Anomalies trigger cascade re-evaluation

SUPPORT PROTOCOL

üéØ 3-Step Process (Mandatory)

Step 1 (0-24 hrs):

  • Email: internship-support@vicharanashala.zohodesk.in
  • Response: 2 hours (9 AM - 9 PM)

Step 2 (24-48 hrs):

  • Subject: Attention Please ‚Äì Follow-up on Ticket #[Number]
  • Response: Mentors Team (voice call)

Step 3 (48+ hrs):

  • Email: Internship Sponsor
  • CC: Prof. Sudarshan, Faculty ref, HOD, dled@iitrpr.ac.in

COMPLETION & CERTIFICATION

‚úÖ Requirements:

  • 100% attendance (1 day leave allowed)
  • ViBe course 100%
  • All Case Studies
  • Assigned project
  • 5 peer endorsements

üìú Certificate:

  • Info: NPTEL website
  • Recommendation letters: Instructor discretion

‚ö†Ô∏è Late submission = Defaulter flag

TERMINATION POLICY

Reasons:

  • Attendance non-compliance
  • Missing milestones
  • Camera OFF violations
  • Academic overlap

Important:

  • ‚ö†Ô∏è Final (no appeals)
  • ‚ö†Ô∏è No rejoining
  • ‚ö†Ô∏è Must reapply for future
  • ‚ö†Ô∏è Funding not guaranteed

Warnings: 2 maximum before termination

TROUBLESHOOTING

Problem Fix
ViBe stuck Refresh ‚Üí Different browser ‚Üí Clear cache
Cliq denied Enable Universal Access in Admin Panel
Photo invisible Set visibility ‚ÄúAnyone‚Äù at accounts.zoho.com
GitHub won‚Äôt open Direct edit OR VS Code OR Clone local
Progress wrong Known issue ‚Üí Auto-fixes (no action)
General issue 3-step support protocol

SAFETY & WARNINGS

‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL RULES

Rule Consequence
Camera OFF Health points loss ‚Üí Warning ‚Üí Termination
Skip attendance form Warning ‚Üí Termination
Miss milestones Termination
Wrong name/email Attendance not counted
Mobile device Platform won‚Äôt work

‚ö° DO‚Äôs & DON‚ÄôTs

DO:

  • ‚úÖ Camera ON always
  • ‚úÖ Desktop/laptop only
  • ‚úÖ Same name & email as registration
  • ‚úÖ Fill form daily
  • ‚úÖ Meet milestones
  • ‚úÖ Help peers (earn points)
  • ‚úÖ Choose evaluators wisely

DON‚ÄôT:

  • ‚ùå Use mobile/tablet
  • ‚ùå Turn camera OFF
  • ‚ùå Miss deadlines
  • ‚ùå Ask in DM
  • ‚ùå Reply outside threads
  • ‚ùå Mutual evaluation

DAILY CHECKLIST

Morning:

  • Join Zoom (Camera ON)
  • Correct name & email
  • Check ViBe milestone

During Day:

  • Attend all sessions
  • Work on Case Studies
  • Help peers on Cliq
  • Make ViBe progress

Evening:

  • Fill attendance form
  • Check tomorrow‚Äôs plan
  • Review progress

TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS

Required:

  • Desktop or Laptop (mandatory)
  • Stable internet connection
  • Working webcam
  • Working microphone
  • Modern browser (Chrome/Edge/Firefox)
  • Google account
  • GitHub account
  • VS Code (recommended)

Not Supported:

  • Mobile phones
  • Tablets
  • iPad/Android tablets

FINAL NOTES

Remember:

  • It‚Äôs a marathon, not a race
  • Focus on learning, not just completion
  • Milestones ensure steady progress
  • Collaboration enhances learning

Success Formula:

  1. Consistency (camera ON daily)
  2. Collaboration (help peers)
  3. Commitment (meet milestones)
  4. Communication (proper channels)

For detailed information, refer to FAQ page or contact support.
